encounter.1: ¡Lucharé con toda mi fuerza para detenerte!
encounter.2: Me da igual que seas un crío. Eres una amenaza y debes irte.
encounter.3: Me dijeron que mandara a todos los entrenadores por donde venían, ¡sin excepciones!
encounter.4: ¡Te mostraré el poder del Paraíso Æther!
encounter.5: Ahora que conoces la oscuridad en lo profundo del Paraíso Æther, es hora de que vayas desapareciendo...

victory.3: ¡Vaya! Con esa fuerza, ¡no creo que pueda detenerte!
victory.4: Vaya... parece que puede que haya perdido.

encounter.1: ¡Yo, Subdirector Fabio, te mostraré la cruda realidad del mundo!
encounter.2: ¿Yo, la última línea de defensa de Æther, battallando a un mero crío?
encounter.3: Yo, Fabio, soy el Subdirector de la Fundación Æther. Soy el único en el mundo, soy irremplazable.

victory.2: ¿C-c-cómo puede ser? Eres tan solo un niño...
victory.3: Este... este es el motivo por el que odio a los niños.

encounter.1: ¡Vas a asustar a mi pobre criatura! Parece que tendré que silenciarte cuanto antes.

¡¿Por qué me sigues molestando?! Estoy cansada de ti. ¡Hasta las narices!
$Se acabó esta charla innecesaria. Este es el poder de Nihilego, ¡te demostraré cuánto te equivocas al venir aquí!

defeat.1: ¡Todo lo que quiero es a esta preciosa criatura! ¡Los demás no me importáis!

encounter.1: ...I'm telling you right now. I'm seriously tough. Act surprised!
encounter.2: I can feel my Pokémon shivering inside their Pokéballs!

defeat.1: Whoa! You're all out of gas, I guess.
defeat.2: Whoa! You're all out of gas, I guess.

encounter.1: My Pokémon have been itching for a battle.
encounter.2: I should warn you, my Pokémon can be quite rambunctious.

victory.1: Striking the right balance of offense and defense... It's not easy to do.
victory.2: Striking the right balance of offense and defense... It's not easy to do.

defeat.1: Do your Pokémon need any healing?
defeat.2: Do your Pokémon need any healing?

encounter.1: You will be shocked by Mira!
encounter.2: Mira will show you that Mira doesn't get lost anymore!

victory.1: Mira wonders if she can get very far in this land.
victory.2: Mira wonders if she can get very far in this land.

encounter.1: Battling is our way of greeting!
encounter.2: We're pulling out all the stops to put your Pokémon down.

victory.1: At times we battle, and sometimes we team up...$It's great how Trainers can interact.
victory.2: At times we battle, and sometimes we team up...$It's great how Trainers can interact.

defeat.1:
You put up quite the display.
Better luck next time.
defeat.2:
You put up quite the display.
Better luck next time.

encounter.1: That's the spirit! I like you!

victory.1: A-ha! You're stronger than I thought!

encounter.1: My goodness! Aren't you young?$You must be quite the trainer to beat my husband, though.$Now I suppose it's my turn to battle!

victory.1: Uwah! Just how strong are you?!

encounter.1:
You're stronger than Mom? Wow!$But I'm strong, too!
Really! Honestly!

victory.1:
Huh? Did I really lose?
Snivel... Grandmaaa!

encounter.1:
How dare you make my precious
granddaughter cry!$I see I need to teach you a lesson.
Prepare to feel the sting of defeat!

victory.1:
Whoa! So strong!
My granddaughter wasn't lying.

encounter.1:
I trained together with my whole family,
every one of us!$I'm not losing to anyone!

victory.1:
I was better than everyone in my family.
I've never lost before...
